plot: Franck is an ordinary pizza delivery boy until the day he wins a beautiful convertible at a Playstation contest. On this day his life is going to change. But not really the way he expected it.
title: La chepor
plot_es: Franck is an ordinary pizza delivery boy until the day he wins a beautiful convertible at a Playstation contest. On this day his life is going to change. But not really the way he expected it.
plot_en: Franck is an ordinary pizza delivery boy until the day he wins a beautiful convertible at a Playstation contest. On this day his life is going to change. But not really the way he expected it.
